28#include <sys/cdefs.h>
29__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_subdev_fb_nv41.c,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:33 riastradh Exp $");
30
31#include "priv.h"
32#include "ram.h"
33
34void
35nv41_fb_tile_prog(struct nvkm_fb *fb, int i, struct nvkm_fb_tile *tile)
36{
37 struct nvkm_device *device = fb->subdev.device;
38 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x100604 + (i * 0x10), tile->limit);
39 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x100608 + (i * 0x10), tile->pitch);
40 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x100600 + (i * 0x10), tile->addr);
41 nvkm_rd32(device, 0x100600 + (i * 0x10));
42 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x100700 + (i * 0x04), tile->zcomp);
43}
44
45void
46nv41_fb_init(struct nvkm_fb *fb)
47{
48 nvkm_wr32(fb->subdev.device, 0x100800, 0x00000001);
49}
50
51static const struct nvkm_fb_func
52nv41_fb = {
53 .init = nv41_fb_init,
54 .tile.regions = 12,
55 .tile.init = nv30_fb_tile_init,
56 .tile.comp = nv40_fb_tile_comp,
57 .tile.fini = nv20_fb_tile_fini,
58 .tile.prog = nv41_fb_tile_prog,
59 .ram_new = nv41_ram_new,
60 .memtype_valid = nv04_fb_memtype_valid,
61};
62
63int
64nv41_fb_new(struct nvkm_device *device, int index, struct nvkm_fb **pfb)
65{
66 return nvkm_fb_new_(&nv41_fb, device, index, pfb);
67}
68
